snippet: Encouraged by the rescue of Spain’s banking sector, Cyprus, which has its own banking issues, has begun preparing euro zone countries for the likelihood of a bailout application.
abstract: Cyprus is preparing euro zone countries and its own public for the likelihood of a bailout application, encouraged by the rescue of Spain's banking sector.

byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and STEPHEN CASTLE
byline.contributor: David Jolly reported from Paris and Stephen Castle from London. Jack Ewing contributed reporting from Frankfurt, Paul Geitner from Brussels and Niki Kitsantonis from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Encouraged by the rescue of Spain’s banking sector, Cyprus, which has its own banking issues, has begun preparing euro zone countries for the likelihood of a bailout application.

headline.main: Cyprus, Under Mounting Pressure, Explores Bailout
headline.print_headline: Cyprus, Under Mounting Pressure, Explores Bailout
